pages.index: FTyoga: Personal Yoga Trainer - Personal Classes for Health and Harmony. Online and Offline Yoga Training with a Professional. Individual Lessons for Beginners and Advanced. Practice yoga with an experienced trainer to improve your physical fitness and emotional well-being. Sign up for a Personal Lesson right now! FTyoga call us Why do you need this? Home or Online About How it works Contact Choose Your Best Yoga Teacher Individual yoga lesson with an instructor online Contact Why do you need yoga with an instructor at home? The yoga teacher takes into account all your wishes, characteristics and pays full attention only to you. The lesson takes place in a place that is familiar to you - at your home. Self-development Yoga harmoniously develops a person at all levels. The practice of yoga improves the body and spirit, suitable for people of any age, any physical fitness and health status Mental health It will help you get rid of stress and tension, teach you to rest and relax. Provides emotional balance, internal balance and good mood Physical health Improves the functioning of all body systems, increases immunity. Strengthens muscles and makes the spine healthy. Provides lightness in the body and good physical shape. Increases protection against injury and disease. Develops coordination, strength, flexibility and endurance Beauty and youth Helps cleanse and rejuvenate the body. Improves figure and skin condition, normalizes hormonal levels, maintains sexual health Improving quality of life Many studies prove the effectiveness of yoga in various areas of life. Practice helps get rid of laziness and fatigue, reveal talents and mental abilities, increase efficiency, improve memory, develop logical thinking Yoga with an instructor individually at your home or online A way to use your time effectively! We often hear admiration for the results from regular yoga classes from our clients, but almost everyone has the same problems that prevent them from achieving their goals. At the initial stage, a standard question arises: "How to start doing yoga at home?" Usually, there is no knowledge for independent practice, even if there is a great desire. There is a lot of information about yoga (literature, Internet), but this knowledge is often unsystematic, contradictory and incomprehensible. There are many video lessons, both paid and free, but there is no guarantee of the quality of the educational material, the competence of the teacher, or that the practice is suitable for you or that you are performing it correctly. It is difficult to talk about any positive results, and indeed there are negative reviews about such classes. The conclusion is obvious - yoga with a professional instructor. You can start attending group classes in one of the yoga studios in our city, but here, too, a number of nuances arise. You need to adapt and spend time on the road... Yoga classes in a group are quite effective, but they are designed for a “relatively healthy average” person; the teacher, of course, will try to pay attention to everyone, but this is not always possible in a large group, and many questions, unfortunately, may remain unanswered... The best option is an individual yoga lesson. Based on our experience of working with different people, we have a solution - the “FTyoga” project. The trainer will come to your home at a time convenient for you. You get maximum results and save your time! Why us? We have the knowledge and experience to conduct individual lessons and are constantly developing in this direction. Regular practice Even if your coach leaves or gets sick, we can provide you with a replacement Save time You don’t need to waste time waiting or traveling there and back - the teacher will arrive at the appointed time or will be in touch online Saving finances The price will not change if you do it with the whole family or invite your friends Experienced instructors All our trainers are qualified to teach yoga and have undergone appropriate training. About Us We are a team of like-minded people united by yoga. We have all gone from beginner to professional yoga instructor, we are constantly practicing and developing in this direction. We have extensive experience in conducting yoga classes in groups, individually, and online. We are ready to share knowledge and experience so that you can avoid mistakes and achieve the desired result as quickly as possible. The theory and philosophy of yoga, the practice of asanas, their safe and correct adjustment, breathing and meditative techniques. We can organize a yoga class with an instructor online, at your home, also outdoors, or an outdoor event. How it works You contact us by phone or by filling out a form on the website We agree on the time of the first free lesson We conduct the first lesson for free Meet the instructor, you tell about yourself and what you want to get from the classes We agree on the time and number of classes We discuss all questions and class schedule You start regular classes With a personal trainer in your home Trial lesson FTyoga Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions
pages.privacy: Privacy Policy at FTyoga: Personal Yoga Trainer - Guarantees of Security and Confidentiality of Your Personal Data in the Process of Individual Lessons and Interaction with Us FTyoga call us Why do you need this? Home or Online About How it works Contact Privacy Policy This Privacy Policy describes Our policies and procedures on the collection, use and disclosure of Your information when You use the Service and tells You about Your privacy rights and how the law protects You. Interpretation and Definitions Interpretation The words of which the initial letter is capitalized have meanings defined under the following conditions. The following definitions shall have the same meaning regardless of whether they appear in singular or in plural. Definitions For the purposes of this Privacy Policy: Account means a unique account created for You to access our Service or parts of our Service. Affiliate means an entity that controls, is controlled by or is under common control with a party, where "control" means ownership of 50% or more of the shares, equity interest or other securities entitled to vote for election of directors or other managing authority. Company (referred to as either "the Company", "We", "Us" or "Our" in this Agreement) refers to FTyoga. Device means any device that can access the Service such as a computer, a cellphone or a digital tablet. Personal Data is any information that relates to an identified or identifiable individual. Service refers to the Website. Service Provider means any natural or legal person who processes the data on behalf of the Company. It refers to third-party companies or individuals employed by the Company to facilitate the Service, to provide the Service on behalf of the Company, to perform services related to the Service or to assist the Company in analyzing how the Service is used. Usage Data refers to data collected automatically, either generated by the use of the Service or from the Service infrastructure itself (for example, the duration of a page visit). You means the individual accessing or using the Service, or the company, or other legal entity on behalf of which such individual is accessing or using the Service, as applicable. Children's Privacy Our Service does not address anyone under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from anyone under the age of 13. If You are a parent or guardian and You are aware that Your child has provided Us with Personal Data, please contact Us. If We become aware that We have collected Personal Data from anyone under the age of 13 without verification of parental consent, We take steps to remove that information from Our servers. If We need to rely on consent as a legal basis for processing Your information and Your country requires consent from a parent, We may require Your parent's consent before We collect and use that information. Links to Other Websites Our Service may contain links to other websites that are not operated by Us. If You click on a third party link, You will be directed to that third party's site. We strongly advise You to review the Privacy Policy of every site You visit. We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies or practices of any third party sites or services. Changes to this Privacy Policy We may update Our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify You of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. We will let You know via email and/or a prominent notice on Our Service, prior to the change becoming effective and update the "Last updated" date at the top of this Privacy Policy. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page. Contact Us If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, You can contact us: By email: FTyoga@gmail.com FTyoga Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions
